mainText:
A sad day. I first typed a college term paper on an Apple II in 1984.   
Have used many Apple products since then. Having constant internet access  
through the iphone 4 I carry around seems so inevitable now that without it I  
would feel I'd lost a piece of my brain.  I guess that's the mark of a  
visionary product.
 
It's kind of heartbreaking to think of all the things that won't get  
invented now.
author: Elizabeth
